We could not be more disappointed and appalled that the decisions by the Supreme Court are undermining the safety of Americans with this week‚Äôs rulings on New York State Rifle & Pistol Association, Inc v. Bruen and now Dobbs v. Jackson Women‚Äôs Health Organization.
And we will continue to both give as a company and share ways in which you can give and become active in what has become the fight for human rights in our country.

It is heartbreaking to see this backsliding after what felt like years of progress. SXSW will continue to stay in Texas and fight, and we will continue to use our platforms to elevate voices who champion democracy.

The Supreme Court‚Äôs decision today, which effectively overturns both Roe v. Wade and Planned Parenthood v. Casey and turns reproductive rights over to state laws, threatens healthcare and reproductive rights in 26 states, including Texas.
